synopsis.text:
Mad scientists and monstrous foes beware, as a powerful cyborg and his unlikely allies embark on a thrilling adventure to save humanity! Once an ordinary boy, Makenko—also known as Kaimyouji Eizan—finds himself transformed into a formidable cyborg after being kidnapped by the nefarious Dr. Mud (or Dr. Mad). With his newfound abilities, Makenko seeks vengeance and longs to regain his former self.

Joining forces with two skilled martial artists, Makendo (Tsurugino Mai) and her younger sister Hikari, the trio faces off against a host of wacky monsters and sinister demons. Though initially reluctant, Makendo becomes an indispensable ally in Makenko's quest for revenge and redemption. Meanwhile, the ever-enthusiastic Hikari is eager to join the fray, making their journey all the more exciting.

As they battle against the forces of evil, the trio's camaraderie and determination shine through. Will they succeed in stopping Dr. Mud's (or Dr. Mad's) malevolent plans and restore Makenko's humanity? Join them in this action-packed anime to find out!
